org.opentosca.toscana.core.plugin.lifecycle

Class ToscanaPlugin<LifecycleT extends AbstractLifecycle>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentosca.toscana.core.plugin.lifecycle.ToscanaPlugin<LifecycleT>
  • Type Parameters:
    LifecycleT - The class type of the plugin specific implementation of the Lifecycle interface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CloudFormationPlugin, CloudFoundryPlugin, KubernetesPlugin

    public abstract class ToscanaPlugin<LifecycleT extends AbstractLifecycle>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the base class for every Plugin that wants to implement the Transformation lifecycle

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ToscanaPlugin(Platform platform)
      Initializes the plugin, that means that all tasks get added to a internal list (executionPhases) that then gets executed by the transform method.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract LifecycleT getInstance(TransformationContext context) 
      Platform getPlatform() 
      protected void init()
      Is called during the initialisation of the plugin
      void transform(LifecycleT lifecycle)
      This method will transform given model (contained in the TransformationContext instance) and will store the result in a directory provided by the context.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ToscanaPlugin

        public ToscanaPlugin(Platform platform)
        Initializes the plugin, that means that all tasks get added to a internal list (executionPhases) that then gets executed by the transform method.

        The tasks get stored in a list (environment tasks)

    • Method Detail

      • init

        protected void init()
        Is called during the initialisation of the plugin

      • getPlatform

        public Platform getPlatform()

      • transform

        public void transform(LifecycleT lifecycle)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        This method will transform given model (contained in the TransformationContext instance) and will store the result in a directory provided by the context.

        Performs the execution in phases in the order that has been defined during the construction of the object

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getInstance

        public abstract LifecycleT getInstance(TransformationContext context)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        context - The transformation context for which the Lifecycle interface should be built
        Returns:
        a newly constructed instance of the LifecycleInterface implemented by this plugin.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
